msbt.message: Hey there! Welcome to Able Sisters, where we sell fashions made lovingly by claw.
Oh, hey, it's the great spot finder, !Thanks for picking this fantastic location for us!
Oh! Hey, ! Welcome to our new shop! Pretty great, right?
We've decided to put down roots here on and keep selling our clothes and accessories.
Hmmwe haven't met before, have we? Well, I'm Mabel and it's a pleasure to meet you.
Here at Able Sisters, we carry a variety of apparel, shoes, and accessories, all lovingly clawmade.

Here, let me give you a quick tour of our shopOK, sowhen you first walk in, you'll find our recommended items right there, front and center. We change these up every single day. You know, to keep things fresh!Then, over on the left, you'll find our mannequins. They're dressed up in whatever seasonal outfits we're into. We change 'em up from time to time rather than daily. Still, we hope you'll be inspired! And of course, if you see something on the mannequins you love, you're more than welcome to buy it. Which brings us to the back wall Here you'll find custom designs brought in by our customers. We'd LOVE to display your designs, of course. And if you want any of these designs, they're yours for free! Now, the last thing I want to tell you about is the fitting room. It's on the right side of the shop in the back. This is where you go to try on anything that's available for sale that day, including all the color variations. Our display space is limited, so the fitting room is also the place to check out items we couldn't put out. Yeah, the fitting room is really great. And it's a terrific way to see how an outfit is coming together.

Here, let me give you a quick tour of our shopOK, sowhen you first walk in, you'll find our recommended items right there, front and center. We change these up every single day. You know, to keep things fresh!Then, over on the left, you'll find our mannequins. They're dressed up in whatever seasonal outfits we're into. We change 'em up from time to time rather than daily. Still, we hope you'll be inspired! And of course, if you see something on the mannequins you love, you're more than welcome to buy it. Which brings us to the back wall Here you'll find custom designs brought in by our customers. We'd LOVE to display your designs, of course. And if you want any of these designs, they're yours for free! Speaking of custom designs, next to the wall displays you'll find our Custom Designs Portal. You can use that kiosk to order designs from creators all over the world, and even share your own! And the last thing I want to tell you about is the fitting room. It's on the right side of the shop in the back. This is where you can go to try on anything that's available for sale that day, including all the color variations. Our display space is limited, so the fitting room is also the place to check out items we couldn't put out. Yeah, the fitting room is really great. And it's a terrific way to see how an outfit is coming together. I think that's everything! Wow. I guess I get kind of chatty when I'm talking about the shop.

Oh, ! Hi! There's something new in the shop.We installed an internet kiosk next to the custom-design display area. See it? It's a Custom Designs Portal!You can use it to order custom designs from creators all over the world, or even share your own! If you're curious, check it out!
We're open every day from 9 AM to 9 PM. I hope I'll be seeing you in here lots.
Thanks! Please come again.<10_7 arg="60" />
Oh! Never mind, then.
Wuh-oh! We've got a minor situation here: your pockets are full. Come on back when you've fixed that.
Oooooh! Um, looks like you're a little short of Bells
Great! That'll be .
All done? Nothing caught your eye?
Hello there!
Thanks so much! I'll just take that tailors ticket off your handsI hope you enjoy your new !
Were you interested in something from the custom-design space?
It looked like you were interested in what's behind the curtain
Were you interested in that display?
Were you interested in this item?
? That's . Interested?
I'll buy!
I'll pass.
Oh, that was designed by my sister, Label! Isn't it fantastic?
That one costs . Do you want to buy it?
I'll buy!

Use a ticket.

I changed my mind.
Oh, hang on!
I should have said this sooner, but thanks for choosing such a great location for our shop!
Oh, I was gonna find you and let you know that we opened a shop, but you obviously figured it out!
Hello there! We haven't met before, have we? I'm Mabel!
Please, take a look around!
We change our lineup every day, so be sure to check back regularly!
Most of the stuff we carry is made here in the shop by my sister!
You can try on anything you like in the fitting room to the right. Feel free to use it whenever!
If you see anything you like, just let me know!
